question.content:
Four college roommates go to the doctor for their annual check up. All of the roommates compare their weights to the previous year.

Bao lost $4\text{ kg}$ over the year.

Shanta lost $2\text{ kg}$ over the year.

Ruth gained $3\text{ kg}$ over the year.

Morty gained $2\text{ kg}$ over the year.

**Which roommate had the greatest change in weight?**

[[â˜ƒ radio 2]]

hints.content:
A weight $\redE{\text{gain}}$ *increases* the amount you weigh. A $\maroonD{\text{loss}}$ *decreases* the amount amount you weigh.

The $\purpleD{\text{change}}$ in weight is related to the *absolute value* of their gain or loss in weight.

The table below shows each roommate's weight and the absolute value.

Roommate | Weight | Absolute value
:- | :-: | :-:
Bao | $\maroonE{-4}$ | $\purpleD{\lvert-4\rvert=4}$
Shanta | $\maroonE{-2}$ | $\purpleD{\lvert-2\rvert=2}$
Ruth | $\redE{+3}$ | $\purpleD{\lvert3\rvert=3}$
Morty | $\redE{+2}$ | $\purpleD{\lvert2\rvert=2}$
Since $4>3>2$, Bao had the biggest change in weight.
Bao had the biggest change in weight.
